snippet: Citing cyberattacks on the new Ukrainian government, President Obama’s nominee to run the National Security Agency, Vice Adm. Michael S. Rogers, said “cyber will be an element of every crisis.”
abstract: Vice Adm Michael S Rogers, Pres Obama’s nominee to run National Security Agency, says major combat commands in United States military will soon have dedicated forces to conduct cyberattacks alongside air, naval and ground capabilities.
lead_paragraph: Citing cyberattacks on the new Ukrainian government, President Obama’s nominee to run the National Security Agency, Vice Adm. Michael S. Rogers, said “cyber will be an element of every crisis.”

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
